Title: Girls Ain't Nothing But Trouble
Plot: Larry Watt, a defense attorney who has caused trouble in Allison's past, asks Allison to be a consultant for him.  Low on money, Allison accepts his offer.  She later has a dream that his client murdered his wife.
GuestStars: William Sadler, John Prosky, Paige Howard, Lauren Rigau, Louisa Kendrick, Gina St. John
